resources.string: キーワードを入力してください

I am always serious about User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) of a product/application. So beside trying to improve the product\'s usability, I always try to add the best UX/UI combination that I can create. \n\nThis requires me to learn from other products, other developers, other ideas. I take this challenge as one of the most interesting parts in application development.
